name: ⤝ Suit of Swords ⤝
description: The Suit of Swords, known also as Blades, Spades, or Leaves, are the cards that represent Elemental Air, whose symbol is $(m)∆$().$(br)  As such, its relations are to thought, subtlety, strategy, force, conflict, strife, movement, balance, belief, judgment, law, intellect, and the mind.$(br)  The Sword of the Magician is the Power to Know.
